page.title: 11 INTERVIEW 2
page.content:
Education is quite good with a secondary and grammar school,Angley and Cranbrook,that serve this area.Mr Taylor has a child at each.There is also several primary schools that serve it.
Employment is a problem everywhere although Mr Taylor and his family are not directly affected.Farming is the major land use and therefore provides a good proportion of the employment.Most of which are in hop gardens and orchards which is only seasonal.Oasters egg production farms is the only industry and provides several jobs.The area's landscape is rapidly changing with hop gardens and orchards being grubbed out an planted with grain crops.
